official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide that the Federal courts shall not have jurisdiction to consider any question involving the validity of any Act of Congress providing for induction for training and service in the Armed Forces of males only or providing for registration of males only for possible induction.

summary.text: Women's Draft Exemption Act - Eliminates Supreme Court and Federal district court jurisdiction with respect to the validity of any Act of Congress which provides for registration or induction of males, but not females, into the armed forces.
